AS4.F.summary: Corticeira Amorim, S.G.P.S., S.A. manufactures and sells cork and cork related products worldwide. The company operates through Raw Materials, Cork Stoppers, Floor and Wall Coverings, Composite Cork, and Insulation Cork segments. It offers wine, champagne and sparkling wine, and capsulated cork stoppers; cork floor and wall coverings, and stone and wood floorings; and cork composite solutions. The company also provides expanded insulation corkboards for use in exterior and interior walls, double walls, paving slabs, flat and sloping roofs, and under floor heating; MDFachada, an expanded insulation corkboard for use in exterior wall cladding, and interior walls and ceilings; LambourdÃ©, a system for quick assembly designed for insulation solutions in new construction and building renovation; Corkoco, a solution for acoustic insulation in ceilings, walls, and floors; Coco, a solution of hard fibers for insulation; expanded cork granulate, a lightweight filling solution with acoustic insulation properties used in floor leveling products, floors, and interior double walls; and Corksorb, a cork based absorbent to absorbs oils, hydrocarbons, and their derivatives without absorbing water. It serves the wine and spirits, construction and infrastructure, architecture and design, aerospace, transportation and energy, sports, and other industries. The company was founded in 1870 and is headquartered in Mozelos, Portugal.

SONI.LS.summary: Sonae IndÃºstria, S.G.P.S., S.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells wood based panels and derivative products in Europe and internationally. It offers raw and technical products, including particleboards, medium density fiberboards, and oriented strand boards; value added products, such as melamine faced boards, accoustic panels, and others; laminates and components; and decorative products. The company also provides chemical products. It serves furniture, construction, and interior design industries. The company was formerly known as Sonae 3P Â Panels, Pulp and Paper, SGPS, SA and changed its name to Sonae IndÃºstria, S.G.P.S., S.A. in December 2005. Sonae IndÃºstria, S.G.P.S., S.A. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Maia, Portugal.
